headline: Implied Volatility Surging for Northern Trust Stock Options
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to NTRS stock based on the movements in the options market lately.

headline: Northern Trust Names New West Region President
summary: LOS ANGELES, June 30, 2025--Northern Trust Wealth Management has appointed Abel Monta単ez as President of the West Region. Monta単ez, who has nearly 25 years of financial services experience, will lead an integrated team that delivers investment management, trust and estate planning, private and business banking and financial consulting for clients.
